<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="sys_hub_flow"> <sys_hub_flow action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <acls/> <active>false</active> <annotation/> <callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api> <category/> <copied_from/> <copied_from_name/> <description><p>Translate text to multiple languages using IBM Watson Translator Service.</p> <p> <b>Inputs:</b> </p> <ul> <li> <strong>Text</strong> - Text to be translated. </li> <li> <strong>Target Languages</strong> - JSON string containing an array of language codes to which the text needs to be translated. Ex: ['fr','it'] </li> <li> <strong>Source Language</strong> - Source language code of the text. Ex: en </li> <li><strong>Additional Parameters</strong> - Unused Input. If a value is passed to this input, it will be ignored.</li> </ul> <p> <b>Outputs:</b> </p> <ul> <li> <strong>Translations</strong> - JSON string containing texts translated to the given target languages. <ul> <br/> Sample translations response <br/>[ <br/>{'target_language':'fr', 'translated_text':'Bonjour'}, <br/>{'target_language':'it', 'translated_text':'ciao'} <br/>] </ul> </li> <li> <strong>Detected Language</strong> - Language code detected by IBM Watson Translator Service for the given text. Returned only if source language code is not populated in input. </li> <li> <strong>Status</strong> - 'Success' if the request succeeds or 'Error' if a failure occurs. </li> <li> <strong>Error Message</strong> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li> <li> <strong>Error Code</strong> - Code for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li> </ul> <p><b>Error Codes - Error Messages:</b></p> <ul> <li>40052 - Text ('text' field) has exceeded its maximum length.</li> <li>40053 - Source language is invalid.</li> <li>40054 - Target language is invalid.</li> <li>40055 - Request is not authorized because credentials are missing or invalid.</li> <li>40056 - Text cannot be translated to target languages.</li> <li>40050 - Error code to populate error messages from IBM Watson Translator service instead of standardized error messages.</li> <li>40051 - Unknown error occurred.</li> </ul>
<p>To use this subflow, a corresponding IBM Watson Translator Service connection and credential must be created and associated with the IBM Translation Connection & Credential alias. <a target="_blank" href="/api/now/v1/context_doc_url/IBM_Watson_Translator_Service_Spoke">Learn More</a></p></description> <internal_name>translate_text_to_multiple_languages</internal_name> action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"> <access>public</access> <acls/> <active>true</active> <annotation/> <callable_by_client_api>false</callable_by_client_api> <category/> <copied_from/> <copied_from_name/> <description><p>Translate text to multiple languages using IBM Watson Translator Service.</p> <p> <b>Inputs:</b> </p> <ul> <li> <strong>Text</strong> - Text to be translated. </li> <li> <strong>Target Languages</strong> - JSON string containing an array of language codes to which the text needs to be translated. Ex: ['fr','it'] </li> <li> <strong>Source Language</strong> - Source language code of the text. Ex: en </li> <li><strong>Additional Parameters</strong> - Unused Input. If a value is passed to this input, it will be ignored.</li> </ul> <p> <b>Outputs:</b> </p> <ul> <li> <strong>Translations</strong> - JSON string containing texts translated to the given target languages. <ul> <br/> Sample translations response <br/>[ <br/>{'target_language':'fr', 'translated_text':'Bonjour'}, <br/>{'target_language':'it', 'translated_text':'ciao'} <br/>] </ul> </li> <li> <strong>Detected Language</strong> - Language code detected by IBM Watson Translator Service for the given text. Returned only if source language code is not populated in input. </li> <li> <strong>Status</strong> - 'Success' if the request succeeds or 'Error' if a failure occurs. </li> <li> <strong>Error Message</strong> - Reason for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li> <li> <strong>Error Code</strong> - Code for error. Populated only when an error occurs. </li> </ul> <p><b>Error Codes - Error Messages:</b></p> <ul> <li>40052 - Text ('text' field) has exceeded its maximum length.</li> <li>40053 - Source language is invalid.</li> <li>40054 - Target language is invalid.</li> <li>40055 - Request is not authorized because credentials are missing or invalid.</li> <li>40056 - Text cannot be translated to target languages.</li> <li>40050 - Error code to populate error messages from IBM Watson Translator service instead of standardized error messages.</li> <li>40051 - Unknown error occurred.</li> </ul>
<p>To use this subflow, a corresponding IBM Watson Translator Service connection and credential must be created and associated with the IBM Translation Connection & Credential alias. <a target="_blank" href="/api/now/v1/context_doc_url/IBM_Watson_Translator_Service_Spoke">Learn More</a></p></description> <internal_name>translate_text_to_multiple_languages</internal_name>
